subject: Football
lead_paragraph: SOUTH BEND, Ind., Nov. 3 (AP) — Navy needed 44 years and three overtimes to beat Notre Dame. The Midshipmen snapped an N.C.A.A.-record 43-game losing streak against the Fighting Irish with a 46-44 victory Saturday.
snippet: SOUTH BEND, Ind., Nov. 3 (AP) — Navy needed 44 years and three overtimes to beat Notre Dame. The Midshipmen snapped an N.C.A.A.-record 43-game losing streak against the Fighting Irish with a 46-44 victory Saturday.
